name: Multiline mail correctness
description: Fires only when all mails is correct.The test on the correctness of mail is simple.List must be comma-separated, but may contain \s* (whitespaces, tabs, line endings, etc.)Examples,ken12@mail.ru,  12nek@mail.ru will captured,but ken12@mail.ru,  512nek@mail.ru orken12@mail.ru  12nek@mail.ru will not.
author: Ramin
